pullrequest.title: New joint creation for the Model Editor

content.raw:
One problem I noticed when using this for the tutorial is that an offset is added to the position of the joint line after saving.

to reproduce:

1.  add two links

1. create joint with default values

1. File -> Save

The orange joint line moves to a different pose
content.html:
One problem I noticed when using this for the tutorial is that an offset is added to the position of the joint line after saving.

to reproduce:

  1. add two links

  2. create joint with default values

  3. File -> Save

The orange joint line moves to a different pose
